-- HELP --
 -Tax Calculation-

 Tax Slab:-
 *Age Below 60
 0 - 2,50,000			0%
 2,50,001 - 5,00,000			10%
 5,00,001 - 10,00,000			20%
 10,00,001 - 1,00,00,000			30%
 1,00,00,001 n above			33%

 *Age between 60 n 80
 0 - 3,00,000			0%
 3,00,001 - 5,00,000			10%
 5,00,001 - 10,00,000			20%
 10,00,001 - 1,00,00,000			30%
 1,00,00,001 n above			33%

 *Age Above 80
 0 - 5,00,000			0%
 5,00,001 - 10,00,000			20%
 10,00,001 - 1,00,00,000			30%
 1,00,00,001 n above			33%

 *Gross Income : Enter Taxable Income.
 *Basic Salary : Enter Base Income.(Important for HRA Calculation).

 -HRA Deduction Calculation-
 *House Rent : Rent you pay.
 *HRA Received : HRA Received from your employer(20-40% of Base salary).

 -Investment Deduction Calculation-
 *80CC/80CCC/80CCD : Limit of Rs. 1,50,000 on total of all items except Infrastructure Bonds (Limit of Rs. 20,000).
 **PF : Amount of PF contributed by you and your company to your PF Account.
 *80D/80E : Interests and Premiums you are paying.
 *Others : It includes Medical bills, Conveyance, Food Coupons, etc.

 -Note-
 *People with Salary(After deductions) belowRs. 5,00,000 are liable to benefit Rs 2,000 Tax Credit
